txt.en: You have run out of time

The wine casks are nearly empty! Northcotton Farm is the main supplier for the Farmers Faire, so it is time to make a trip to restock.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends. </rgb>

'This is not good, [placeholder]; we are nearly out of wine. This will not go over well amongst the partygoers. Head to Northcotton Farm to find another cask for the market and bring it back as quickly as you can.\n\n'Here...take this pie. It uses my great grand-mother's secret recipe, and it is said to lend you incredible speed when you take a bite of it. Hurry now. Do not tarry!'
Northcotton Farm is in Oatbarton, north of Brockenborings at the top-most border of the Shire near Evendim.\n\nYou should run to the farm and return with a cask of wine before the time runs out.
'Hurray, [placeholder]! You are the hero of the Farmers Faire!'

Sperling Took, the supplier of the Farmers Faire, can be found in Bywater.\n\nYou should return to Bywater as quickly as you can, taking bites of the pie to help you along if you find yourself needing a burst of energy.
'Hurry, [placeholder]! This is not the time to dilly-dally so!'
Collect a cask of wine (eat pie for a burst of energy)
Carry the cask of wine to the Farmers Market
To Northcotton Farm: Restocking the Wine
